name: Mommy (itch) (Aitor, Barrilero, PabloLarrie, DrTek)
description:
Mommy is a game where you impersonate Popo, a lovely character that is in the search for his mom after waking up in a strange cave. Soon he finds that he can change between the Real and the Dream world to bypass the challenges and monsters awaiting in this fungus cave.

Controls

Move - W, A, S and D
Jump - SPACE
Attack - Left Mouse Button
Swap worlds - Right Mouse Button

This prototype was developed for the "It is not real" themed Brackey's 2022.1's Game Jam.

Credits

Game development - Aitor Bouzas Naveira and Pablo Larrubia Sande
Game design - Aitor Bouzas Naveira and Pablo Larrubia sande
Music - Roberto González Viéitez
Sound FX - Jose Aranda

Images and animations - yudemgoy and maaot
Font - Zakar Kerdikoshvili
Dialog Manager - Afely

Source code

https://github.com/aitorbouzas/mommy
